content:
an eth1 block has to be within this range
```
upper_bounds_ts = genesis_time + (voting_period_start_slot*seconds_per_slot) - (eth1_follow_distance * seconds_per_eth1_block)
lower_bounds_ts = genesis_time + (voting_period_start_slot*seconds_per_slot) - (eth1_follow_distance * seconds_per_eth1_block * 2)
```
